title: Blue Rose Zyra Skin Idea - 975RP - 1350RP?
body:
https://40.media.tumblr.com/4722fe4fdfee7a95eb859858c8ba06f4/tumblr_niij77sJxN1tirp9oo1_1280.jpg

Artist: http://bilopsis.deviantart.com/


She looks so beautifulllllll

replies.body: The colors for this are gorgeous, and I love the roses. :o
If you changed the name slightly to Black Rose Zyra it could even tie into the lore. You could still keep the dark blue though, since it looks great as is.
Make it happen pl0x :) I LOVE Zyra.
Congratulations with the red post, I guess. At least one of us has made it.
Roses are red...

now they're blue
a new {{champion:143}} skin is long over due
[Have an Upvote](http://i.imgur.com/Li6mw4p.gif)
http://xkcd.com/1351/
This might pass for a 750 skin if it was a pure recolor.

I somehow doubt any Zyra skin will be 750.  There was a red post a while ago that talked about how Zyra is one of the more difficult champions to make skins for because of her plants adding in so much extra work to the skin creation process.
Recoloring can't be all that difficult? But it would probably be 1350 if it had roses added.

> [{quoted}](name=Phrixscreoth,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GkG0bKI4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-02T02:50:06.653+0000)
>
> I somehow doubt any Zyra skin will be 750.  There was a red post a while ago that talked about how Zyra is one of the more difficult champions to make skins for because of her plants adding in so much extra work to the skin creation process.

They say that a lot.
You'd think they would learn after Kha'zix, Udyr, Zyra, Zac, Jynx, and the various other champions that they gave that particular reason when asked about the lack of skins.
HNNNNNGHH ZYRA! I really really like this idea. @u@
Amazing <3 I hope that rework won't destroy her .-.
Make it happen :D. This skin concept is too beautiful to pass up on ^3^.

Oh baby.

I'm always for new Zyra skins.

The picture is beautiful.

Also, Riot, could you make a Zyra skin that has some new "jokes" and other emotes? I was excited to buy Haunted Zyra when she came out, but disappointed to find that all of her emotes, dances, etc. were the same as the rather boring default.
i'd like something like a Coral Zyra, you know, shiny colors, Koi Nami style, coral reefs and such

She's wearing too much plants!  Unravel her a little  bit here and there on the sides so that only her nipples are covered by tiny vines.

But, seriously, I love the skin.  My favorite part are her shoulder pads/roses.  Cool.
Meh
975 if particles were changed to blue (including plants) and maybe a new recall / passive. 1350 if new particles, plants, passive, and maybe recall.

Also: 

http://justduet.deviantart.com/art/zyra-446491327

she just needs a skin that isn't brown, red or fire ~_~
this looks cool.
I like it  a lot. I'd say 975 unless it comes with some nifty particles, then 1350.

What about a Black Rose theme since the black rose is an actual cult in the game's lore headed by {{champion:7}} .

Give a sort of Leblanc feel to it. This design is bomb tho

I was literally just looking at Zyra saying she needs a new skin that is a bit more... vibrant? Her others are nice, but they don't really have a spark that catches my eye — this however, does. I think they missed a chance giving her a Valentine's themed skin this year. (Like a sweetheart skin, instead of Annie getting one.) Pink roses, hearts and the such would suit her.

> [{quoted}](name=divinestep,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GkG0bKI4,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-02-02T04:56:36.014+0000)
>
> I was literally just looking at Zyra saying she needs a new skin that is a bit more... vibrant? Her others are nice, but they don't really have a spark that catches my eye — this however, does. I think they missed a chance giving her a Valentine's themed skin this year. (Like a sweetheart skin, instead of Annie getting one.) Pink roses, hearts and the such would suit her.

There's still other Valentines day skins on the way, Annie's just came early.
In old times of LoL it would be for 520

Victorious like.

I like it.
Absolutely stunning! This would be great ^_^
This looks AMAZING.
I love Zyra! So much yes here
seksi
Love it!

I will like to see Project Yasuo with blue animations instant of orange .
Or. Maybe  a recolour system that will show you the 3d model and you will have the posibility to change colours ,something like this:
Colour 1:white
Colour 2:grey
Colour3: black 
Effect colour:blue 
And to change colours you will need to buy a colours for 100rp or sets for 500 etc....
